text: I think it's great that you are considering both University and Apprenticeships.  There are a lot of good things about both of those and they can both help you to your desired outcome.  When I'm looking at candidates, it's really important that they are able to convey their passion for what they want to do.  Being able to talk about your inspirations really demonstrates this.  Do you have specific films / filmmakers that you look up to / love the work of?
I really like studio ghibli and Tim burntons styles of animation and storyline. Corpse bride and Coraline are some of my favourite films
Ah lovely.  I love Frankenweenie :slightly_smiling_face: Did you see Isle of Dogs?
No I have not seen it yet
